message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I think this is a good deal for both of us.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair. It gives us both a good share, and it's a better deal for me than your previous offer.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value fast, especially for you. This offer is still better than what you'll get if we continue to haggle.
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  We both lose more money with every round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most sensible option at this point.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this one. This is a good offer considering how quickly the money is losing value for you. It's time to be realistic!

Alice, we're both losing a lot of money here. I'm willing to compromise. This offer is still better for you than the last round, and it's the best we can do with the remaining rounds. Let's not let pride get in the way of a good deal.
